definition: the eight points of the compass/all directions

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
in all directions/all around/far and near
lit. the eyes watch six roads and the ears listen in all directions/to be observant and alert (idiom)
pinyin: yan3 guan1 liu4 lu4 er3 ting1 ba1 fang1

definition: see 眼觀四面，耳聽八方|眼观四面，耳听八方[yan3 guan1 si4 mian4 , er3 ting1 ba1 fang1]
pinyin: yan3 guan1 si4 chu4 , er3 ting1 ba1 fang1

definition: lit. the eyes observe all sides and the ears listen in all directions (idiom)/fig. to be observant and alert
pinyin: yan3 guan1 si4 mian4 , er3 ting1 ba1 fang1

sentences.english: Like an animal at bay, the bandit chieftain laid about in desperation.
sentences.chinese: 土匪头子困兽犹斗，在绝望中向四面八方乱打一气。

sentences.english: The city sprawls for miles in each direction.
sentences.chinese: 这座城市向四面八方扩展了几英里。

sentences.english: We take your bags and send them in all directions。
sentences.chinese: 我们将拿走您的行李，送往四面八方。

sentences.english: In our modern society we have a huge amount of things coming at us from all directions.
sentences.chinese: 在现代社会，我们有来自四面八方的大量事情要做。

sentences.english: More incapable withstanding in all directions accusation.
sentences.chinese: 更无力承受四面八方的指责。

sentences.english: At early times, all matter took the form of a hot and all-pervading gas.
sentences.chinese: 在早期，一切物质都处于炽热且弥漫八方的气体状态。

sentences.english: A confluent small-pox had in all directions flowed over his face .
sentences.chinese: 天花打四面八方汇合拢来，布满了他整个脸孔。

sentences.english: Hotels will be professional service and comfortable environment P Plus welcome guests.
sentences.chinese: 酒店将以专业的服务，舒适的环境恭迎八方宾客。

sentences.english: The affrighted poultry fled in all directions.
sentences.chinese: 受惊的家禽向四面八方逃去。

sentences.english: A system of roads radiates from the town centre.
sentences.chinese: 一组道路从市中心向四面八方伸展出去。

sentences.english: I love the pression from everything.
sentences.chinese: 我很喜欢来自四面八方的压力。

sentences.english: The fires were spreading in all directions in the dry conditions.
sentences.chinese: 大火在干燥的天气下正向四面八方蔓延。

sentences.english: The prospecting team traversed far and wide in search of mineral deposits.
sentences.chinese: 地质勘探队为寻找矿藏而走遍四面八方。

sentences.english: All around we hear wolves howling.
sentences.chinese: 四面八方都能听见狼嚎声。

sentences.english: Temple was very small, but people from all the directions went there and kowtowed to the deities.
sentences.chinese: 庙虽小，但来四面八方的人们都来这儿向神灵朝拜。

sentences.english: It was ingeniously designed so that one can enjoy the view from all four sides.
sentences.chinese: 它设计得真妙，从四面八方都可以赏景。

definition: in all directions/all around/far and near
all rivers run into the sea/use different means to obtain the same result (idiom)
the five regions: the east, south, west, north and center/all parts/China and the lands beyond its frontiers
yin and yang/heaven and earth/the universe
Xiangyun county in Dali Bai autonomous prefecture 大理白族自治州[Da4 li3 Bai2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan
the whole world/throughout the land/everything under the sun
